name: h3
description: Experience the unparalleled performance of the 2026 DeMarini The Goods Drop 5 USSSA Baseball Bat, designed for both contact and power hitters. With its balanced swing feel and a striking teal, red, and black colorway, this bat features a robust X14 Alloy Barrel that offers a massive sweet spot for effortless swings. The Paraflex Plus Composite Handle ensures a superior feel, while the Direct Connection provides a stiff yet comfortable responsiveness. Enhanced with a redesigned Tremor End Cap, this bat optimizes power for maximum impact, making it an essential tool for serious players in the USSSA 1.15 BPF circuit. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
